source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot opens on a paved path in a park, leading to a monument with a large building in the background. The camera pulls back to reveal a wider view of the park, showing people walking and sitting on benches and the grass.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot opens on a paved path in a park, leading to a monument with a large building in the background. The camera pulls back to reveal a wider view of the park, showing people walking and sitting on benches and the grass.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a dirt trail through a dense forest, weaving between trees. The camera pans upward to follow a flock of birds flying overhead, while a few hikers cross a wooden bridge in the distance.
